fsrtool.name: fsrtool_jb_apis
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_jb_apis` ( `charID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `ownerID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `charName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `corpID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `keyID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `vCode` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `accessMask` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(3) DEFAULT '0', `message` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`charID`,`ownerID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
